snippet: The German federal government was not involved in Thursday's decision by local authorities in the town of Gaggenau to ban an event where Turkish Justice Minister Bekir Bozdag was due to speak, a spokesman for the German foreign ministry said....

headline.main: Government Forces Recapture Northern Afghanistan District
headline.print_headline: Government Forces Recapture Northern Afghanistan District

lead_paragraph: The German federal government was not involved in Thursday's decision by local authorities in the town of Gaggenau to ban an event where Turkish Justice Minister Bekir Bozdag was due to speak, a spokesman for the German foreign ministry said.
